modName: No More Bug in Jar Sounds
summary: Removes the buzzing noises for the bugs in jars.
descriptionHtml:
From the mod author who brought you "No More Bee Sounds", I present, "No More Bug in Jar Sounds".

When I first made the No More Bee Sounds mod, I did it out of annoyance at the droning noise in my Hearthfire greenhouse, and assumed that others were annoyed too. However, I have come to understand that a lot of people who downloaded that mod did so not only out of annoyance, but out of a real life dislike of bugs and bees. That said, I hope this is another modification that will help some of you breathe easier while playing. If you have anything similar to this you'd like to see, please feel free to contact me.

If you play an alchemist, apothecary, nature-loving character, or just enjoy adding some entomologic decor to your home, but don't enjoy the constant buzzing noise that the bugs-in-jars make, this mod is for you. Like my previous mod, I've simply gone into the Creation Kit and removed the actual sound that the bugs in jars make. If you want them back, just uninstall the mod. It's compatible with everything and shouldn't alter any gameplay.Â 

Note that this mod leaves in the regular bee sounds. (The ones that aren't in a jar.)
If you want those removed too, please see [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67215/?]No More Bee Sounds[/url].

Thank you, and enjoy!

Note: I'm the original author of this mod, but I've switched to this account and reuploaded because there is no way to change usernames in Nexus.
author: GracefulGopher

files.name: No More Bug In Jar Sounds
